title: Sialton
author: Sialton
content: POW Coins Tracker:LowHash.orgWhy?In a landscape saturated with thousands of POW coins, the majority remain stagnant, making it a time-consuming endeavor to unearth truly valuable and dynamic projects.While most POW coin trackers fixate solely on immediate gains, we've taken a different path - we center our attention on the project itself: its core values, practical applications, and potential impact.We offer a comprehensive evaluation of each project featured on our platform, assessing key aspects such as the team, product quality, recent developments, and the project's overall mission and description.Visit us: https://lowhash.org/Join Us In Social Medias:Telegram: https://t.me/+zIner6I22V82YmFiDiscord:   https://discord.gg/EsHQeDM3SZDonate to us to maintain the website!0x coins:0x3d309EE9F96eD8F18c8d213Fb2A33a4204E15880 Bitcoin:bc1qqe3ju0f47jmecqfxm7xttxvtgw5uewh6kfk3t5Monero:4362U3tUDi78QdiSCRCXsYg3ukAfKJn9g5eXd2MAonFb98bMx774me63XXEiYh3846Ug59jWojTJRBk BAFbBSNWdVPqtqVn

comments.author: Bialke
comments.body: I hope your website will grow. This is a really nice project.Cool would be a definition of what you think is a "fair lauched POW coin"!

comments.author: Sialton
comments.body: That's so nice of you, thank you! I've heard so many critics last days, that didn't want to open this reply.."Fairly Launched POW Coin" Means a coin which uses Proof Of Work and which had no premine

comments.author: jimboscott
comments.body: Need to include Kaspa.  Fair launch.  POW only.  Strong community.

comments.author: Sialton
comments.body: Yes, thank you, I was planning to add it  with the next update, for now trying to make the website look good

comments.author: k860831
comments.body: What is the basis for the coin’s upside potential? Any rational in-depth analysis? Otherwise, everything look no different from the lunatic who shouted about to the moon.

comments.author: Sialton
comments.body: Quote from: xuansiji on September 27, 2023, 04:32:58 PMWhat does DP mean?DP means 'daily profit mining this coin with 1660S'

comments.author: Sialton
comments.body: Quote from: k860831 on September 27, 2023, 09:49:28 PMWhat is the basis for the coin’s upside potential? Any rational in-depth analysis? Otherwise, everything look no different from the lunatic who shouted about to the moon.The 'x' is based on the market cap of the project, it's fundamentals, marketing and the team.

comments.author: k860831
comments.body: Quote from: Sialton on October 11, 2023, 04:50:28 PMQuote from: k860831 on September 27, 2023, 09:49:28 PMWhat is the basis for the coin’s upside potential? Any rational in-depth analysis? Otherwise, everything look no different from the lunatic who shouted about to the moon.The 'x' is based on the market cap of the project, it's fundamentals, marketing and the team.You'd better show your investigation process on your website, with less subjective assumptions and more data comparison（with competitive projects） and analysis, so that can be more convincing.
